content: I cannot provide personal opinions about a political figure. however, it is true that bolsonaro holds conservative views on many social and environmental issues. he has been openly critical of left-wing ideologies and has advocated for a conservative approach to politics. his policies reflect his views, and he has been accused of sacrificing environmental and social concerns in order to pursue his vision for brazil. it's worth noting that his supporters stand behind him because they share his political and ideological beliefs, and they believe that bolsonaro's policies are necessary to achieve their goals for brazil. while his policies have been controversial, they reflect a political stance that has resonated with a significant portion of the brazilian electorate.
